ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client is currently pregnant"Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant""Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rubellacontraindications * Tabs: Rubella
Human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccination is contraindicated"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated""Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HPVcontraindications * Tabs: HPV
Do not vaccinate client with HPV as HPV vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.Do not vaccinate client with HPV as HPV vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.Do not vaccinate client with HPV as HPV vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HPVcontraindications * Tabs: HPV
The client has history of severe allergic reactions'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
HPV vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HPVcontraindications * Tabs: HPV
Do not vaccinate client with HPV if client has history of a severe allergic reaction after a previous HPV vaccine dose, or to a component of the vaccine.Do not vaccinate client with HPV if client has history of a severe allergic reaction after a previous HPV vaccine dose, or to a component of the vaccine.Do not vaccinate client with HPV if client has history of a severe allergic reaction after a previous HPV vaccine dose, or to a component of the vaccine. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HPVcontraindications * Tabs: HPV
